mapper.select: SELECT id, customer_name, address, tel, hashed_password, email, create_date, update_date, version FROM customer WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer ( customer_name, address, tel, hashed_password, email, create_date, update_date, version) VALUES ( #{customerName}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{hashedPassword}, #{email}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), 1 )
INSERT INTO creditcard ( encrypted_creditno, customer_id, create_date, update_date, version) VALUES ( #{encryptedCreditno}, #{customer.id}, current_timestamp(), current_timestamp(), 1 )
